input.sentences: today we went on a hunt to find things that were yellow .
looking over the water into the city we imagined how many things were yellow .
another piece is yellow too ! wow !
the crane is yellow also ! this city has the color yellow everywhere ! !
output.sentences: The hunt for Mr.Yellow led me to the Yellow Coast.
Drawn to water, Mr. Yellow imagined the world in yellow.
There were industrial machines painted bright yellow.
I was wowed by machines transformed to yellow art pieces.
Then I stared up at a yellow crane set off by the deep blue color of the sky.
